trans-unit.source: After the availability group listener is created, it may be necessary to adjust the **RegisterAllProvidersIP** and **HostRecordTTL** cluster parameters for the listener resource.
trans-unit.target: After the availability group listener is created, it may be necessary to adjust the **RegisterAllProvidersIP** and **HostRecordTTL** cluster parameters for the listener resource.

trans-unit.source: These parameters may reduce reconnection time after a failover which may prevent connection timeouts.
trans-unit.target: These parameters may reduce reconnection time after a failover which may prevent connection timeouts.

trans-unit.source: For more information on these parameters, as well as sample code, see [Create or Configure an Availability Group Listener](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh213080.aspx#MultiSubnetFailover).
trans-unit.target: For more information on these parameters, as well as sample code, see [Create or Configure an Availability Group Listener](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh213080.aspx#MultiSubnetFailover).
